root.name: S.W.I.V.
root.description: A pure overhead scrolling (vehicle-) shoot'em up. Successor to Silkworm. You either control a jeep or a helicopter. The game features a unique dynamic continuous loading system uninterrupted game play (from start to end). The game is just one big level. Furthermore the game has adaptive/reactive difficulty level. Not to mention the multiplayer (for 2) and the graphic detail. There are lots of graphical explosions and war-like sound effects.
